dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1623 IH: To repeal the Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Incentive Program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Russell introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To repeal the Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Incentive Program.

section.header: Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Incentive Program repeal

subsection.text: Effective on the date of enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Energy may not make any additional awards or loans under section 136 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 (42 U.S.C. 17013).

Upon the repayment, in accordance with the terms of the loan agreements, of all loans made before the date of enactment of this Act under subsection (d) of such section, section 136 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 (42 U.S.C. 17013) is repealed.
